title: Upload CV as PDF (optional)
description: If you already have a CV, you can upload it here as a PDF. This way I can read it in advance and help you faster.

warning.title: Please do not include diagnoses or medical details in documents.
warning.subtitle: PDF up to 10 MB. No sensitive health data or third-party documents.

dropzone.drag: Drag the file here or click to select
dropzone.aria: Upload PDF file - Click or drag file here

errors.fileType: Please upload a PDF file up to maximum 10 MB.
errors.fileSize: Please upload a PDF file up to maximum 10 MB.
